newsitem.title: CHINA: Typhoon Niki kills seven on China's Hainan island.
newsitem.headline: Typhoon Niki kills seven on China's Hainan island.

text.p: Typhoon Niki killed seven people when it roared past China's Hainan Island on its way to northern Vietnam, the China News Service said on Friday.
The seven were killed as the typhoon ravaged the resort city of Sanya on the island province's southern tip, which was lashed by high winds of up to 150 kph (93 mph) and heavy rains, the agency said.
The typhoon caused a suspension of the city's power and water supplies, a temporary closure of its international airport and left traffic in chaos, it said but gave no other details.
Typhoon Niki swept across storm-battered northern Vietnam early on Friday but initial reports indicated the region had been spared further major damage.
